meanings.definition: The quality or state of being able to be soldered.
meanings.sent1: Her solderabilities made her the go-to person for fixing broken jewelry.
meanings.sent2: The solderabilities of the metal determined its usefulness in electronics.
meanings.sent3: The robot boasted about its impressive solderabilities at the tech fair.
meanings.sent4: His solderabilities were as strong as the bond between two best friends.
meanings.sent5: The solderabilities of the new alloy shone brightly in the eyes of the craftsmen.

meanings.definition: The ability of a material to be joined together using solder.
meanings.sent1: The solderabilities of the circuit board allowed for easy repairs.
meanings.sent2: Engineers tested the solderabilities of different metals for the project.
meanings.sent3: The competition showcased the most unique solderabilities of various materials.
meanings.sent4: The solderabilities of the steel were unmatched, holding everything together.
meanings.sent5: The artist marveled at the solderabilities of the silver, creating intricate designs.
